sense.gloss: to shorten, to cut short, to trim
to cut down on, to reduce, to scrimp on, to economize, to economise

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑生活↑↓せいかつ↓↑費↑↓ひ↓を↑切↑↓|き↓り↑詰↑↓つ↓める|ようにといった。
sdata.e: He told me to cut down the cost of its production.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは↑出資↑↓しゅっし↓を↑切↑↓|き↓り↑詰↑↓つ↓める|でしょう。
sdata.e: They will cut down on their expenses.
